wordGroup: exclusionary rule 证据排除法则；不采纳规定

sentences.en: Academic inquiry, at least in some fields, may need to become less exclusionary and more holistic.
sentences.cn: 至少在部分领域，学术调查可能需要减少排他性，变得更全面一些。

sentences.en: Second, liars use fewer exclusionary words — but, nor, except, whereas.
sentences.cn: 其次，说谎者较少使用排他词语——但是，也不，除了，然而。

sentences.en: I do think that it really is exclusionary not to realise that this is not nude for everyone.
sentences.cn: 而且我认为，忽略裸色并不是对所有人而言这点，确实排斥了一些人。
